raw_body: LUDOWYK – THEODORE DERRICK BRIAN – Beloved son of late Desmond & Bertha,​ loving husband of Durgha (nee Weerasekara),​ beloved father of Damian,​ Tashmi and Jason,​ loving brother of Sandra and Tania,​ father-in-law of Peshani. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 3.15 p.m. today,​ Thursday 21st for Cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Kanatte at 3.30 p.m.084051
